editor.Add ingredients there: Add ingredients there, one ingredient by line
editor.Add steps there: Add step there, one step by line
editor._No need to save manually. Everything is: No need to save manually. Everything is saved in really time.

_CookBook is in alpha: CookBook is currently in Alpha version. It means it may contain few bugs and it is not ready to be used by everybody. You were sent an access to this version to help finalizing CookBook.
_Please do not sent it to anyone else wi: Please do not sent it to anyone else without the authorization of the author of CookBook

settings.ingredient template: Template for ingredients in shopping list

import.Only few recipe catalog are managed: Impossible to import from this website. We suggest you to enter the recipe manually this time.
import.Oups an error happened. We suggest you t: Oups an error happened. We suggest you to enter the recipe manually this time.

_Do you really want to delete your accou: Do you really want to delete your account?
_For security reasons: For security reasons, you should logout, login and then you will be able to delete this account
_If you click on new recipe with a valid: If you click on new recipe with a valid url in your clipboard, it will be automatically imported.

focusMode.And remember to take photos: Enjoy your meal and remember to take photos.
focusMode.Say next to Move to the next step: Say "Next" to move to the next step.
focusMode.Make a thumbs up: Make a thumbs up gesture to move to the next step.
focusMode.Voice recognition not supported by your: Voice recognition not supported by your browser
focusMode.While the focus mode is activated, your: In the cooking mode, your device will never go to sleep so you can follow the steps easily.
